title: The 72 Best Amazon Prime Day Beauty Deals to Shop on Day 2
description: Get major discounts on Cosrx, Kiehl’s, and more before the sale wraps.
excerpt: Plus, get major discounts on Kiehl's, Solawave, and more before the sale wraps.
text: Looking to restock your vanity for less? Now's the perfect time, thanks to Amazon Prime Big Deal Days. Ending tonight at midnight PST, the retailer's 48-hour blowout includes steep savings on everything from the best drugstore makeup to luxury skincare tools and products from beloved brands like Urban Decay, Cosrx, Solawave, Ghd, and more—but not every deal is actually worth shopping.To save you precious time, we scrolled through pages of deals to bring you 72 of the best Prime Day beauty deals worth snagging immediately. Score them all below, and while you’re filling your cart, make sure to browse our roundups of the best Amazon October Prime Day fashion and tech deals, too.Jump to:Best Prime Day Skin Care DealsBest Prime Day Hair DealsBest Prime Day Beauty Tool DealsBest Prime Day Makeup DealsBest Prime Day Body Product DealsBest Prime Day Skin Care DealsWhether you have dry or acne-prone skin, Amazon has tons of great products to suit every complexion type and concern. Currently, you can score up to 56 percent off coveted finds like Tula’s classic cleanser, Cosrx’s viral barrier-repair serum, and Kiehl’s eye cream. A seasoned trend forecaster and fashion historian, she analyzes viral products and trends on a deeper level. When she’s not writing for Cosmopolitan, ELLE, Harper’s BAZAAR, House Beautiful, Town & Country, Delish and other publications, she can be found roaming the Museum at FIT (her alma matter) or sewing her own couture while she binge-watches reality TV.
html:
Looking to restock your vanity for less? Now's the perfect time, thanks to Amazon Prime Big Deal Days. Ending tonight at midnight PST, the retailer's 48-hour blowout includes steep savings on everything from the best drugstore makeup to luxury skincare tools and products from beloved brands like Urban Decay, Cosrx, Solawave, Ghd, and more—but not every deal is actually worth shopping.

To save you precious time, we scrolled through pages of deals to bring you 72 of the best Prime Day beauty deals worth snagging immediately. Score them all below, and while you’re filling your cart, make sure to browse our roundups of the best Amazon October Prime Day fashion and tech deals, too.

Jump to:

  • Best Prime Day Skin Care Deals
  • Best Prime Day Hair Deals
  • Best Prime Day Beauty Tool Deals
  • Best Prime Day Makeup Deals
  • Best Prime Day Body Product Deals

Best Prime Day Skin Care Deals

Whether you have dry or acne-prone skin, Amazon has tons of great products to suit every complexion type and concern. Currently, you can score up to 56 percent off coveted finds like Tula’s classic cleanser, Cosrx’s viral barrier-repair serum, and Kiehl’s eye cream.

Tula Cult Classic Purifying Face Cleanser

Now 12% Off

Best Prime Day Beauty Tool Deals

High-tech beauty tools, like the best LED face masks and at-home laser hair removal devices, can cost a pretty penny. But thanks to Amazon’s October Prime Day, you can score all of these and more for a fraction of the cost. We’re currently eyeing this $48 L’Ange blow dryer brush and Solawave’s celeb-loved red light wand that’s 40 percent off.

Best Prime Day Body Product Deals

From hydrating lotions to utility items like razors and electric toothbrushes, Amazon has everything you need to stock your bathroom drawers. Need to re-up on deodorant? Save on Donna Karan’s aluminum-free version for a fresh, natural option. Or, eager to achieve a mega-watt smile? Crest’s classic whitening kit is currently just $30 for Prime members.

Tatjana Freund is Hearst's Fashion & Luxury Commerce Editor, covering beauty, fashion and more across multiple brands. Previously, she worked at ELLE.com and Marie Claire. She's a fan of whiskey neat, podcasts that give her nightmares, and one time Zoë Kravitz laughed at a joke she made. 

Sarah Maberry is a commerce writer for Hearst Magazines, where she covers fashion, beauty and pop culture. A seasoned trend forecaster and fashion historian, she analyzes viral products and trends on a deeper level. When she’s not writing for Cosmopolitan, ELLE, Harper’s BAZAAR, House Beautiful, Town & Country, Delish and other publications, she can be found roaming the Museum at FIT (her alma matter) or sewing her own couture while she binge-watches reality TV.
